# Hyvä UI - popup.A - newsletter image

[![License]](../../../LICENSE.md)
[![Hyva Supported Versions]](https://docs.hyva.io/hyva-ui-library/getting-started.html)
[![Tailwind Supported Versions]](https://tailwindcss.com/)
[![AlpineJS Supported Versions]](https://alpinejs.dev/)
[![Figma]](https://www.figma.com/@hyva)

This example uses a newsletter template file, added in the footer by xml, to render a popup with the subscription form.

The popup is shown on each page load, so configure to you own needs.

## Usage - Template

1. Copy or merge the following files/folders into your theme:
   * `Magento_Newsletter/templates/modal.phtml`
   * `Magento_Newsletter/layout/default.xml`
2. Adjust the content and code to fit your own needs and save
3. Create your development or production bundle by running `npm run watch` or `npm run build-prod` in your
   theme's tailwind directory

## Notes

The font-family is not altered, unlike the font-sizes and colors. You can change those to fit your design.
